io.simplesource.saga.action.http

Class HttpSpec<A,K,B,O,R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.simplesource.saga.action.http.HttpSpec<A,K,B,O,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - - common representation type for all action commands (typically Json / GenericRecord for Avro)
    K - - key for the output topic
    B - - body for Http request
    O - - output returned by the Http request - also normally quite generic
    R - - final result type that ends up in output topic

    public final class HttpSpec<A,K,B,O,R>
extends Object
